description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 20/00825/FUL (Variation of Conditions 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9, 13, 14, 20, 22, 34 & 36 of Planning Permission Ref:17/14178/FUL) for a number of changes to improve the scheme and to meet various Building Regulations standards.

ART4 Name: New Malden District Centre Inset Area
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: In respect of condition 2 of application reference 20/00825/FUL,The following plans:A11374D0099P1 Proposed Basement Plan 08/12/2017A11374D0102P1 Proposed Level 2 08/12/2017A11374D0101P1 Proposed Level 1 08/12/2017A11374D0100P1 Proposed Ground Floor Plan 08/12/2017A11374D0103P1 Proposed Level 3 08/12/2017A11374D0104P1 Proposed Level 4 08/12/2017A11374D0105P1 Proposed Level 5 08/12/2017A11374D0106P1 Proposed Level 6 08/12/2017A11374D0200P1 Proposed Elevation 1 and Elevation 2 08/12/2017A11374D0201P1 Proposed Elevation 3 and Elevation 4 08/12/2017A11374D0202P1 Proposed Elevation 5 and Elevation 6 08/12/2017A11374D0203P1 Proposed Elevation 7 and Elevation 8 08/12/2017are replaced by:A11883G0550P1 Planning Variations West Elevation & South Elevation 22/03/2021A11883G0551P1 Planning Variations East, North and South Facing Courtyard Elevations 22/03/2021A11883G0552P1 Planning Variations East Elevation West Facing Elevation 22/03/2021A11883G1099P1 Planning Variations Level -1 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021A11883G1100P1 Planning Variations Level 00 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021A11883G1101P1 Planning Variations Level 01 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021A11883G1102P1 Planning Variations Level 02 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021A11883G1103P1 Planning Variations Level 03 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021A11883G1104P1 Planning Variations Level 04 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021A11883G1105P1 Planning Variations Level 05 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021A11883G1106P1 Planning Variations Level 06 General Arrangement Plan 22/03/2021

Please provide a Proposed Roof Plan for the outbuilding at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing  showing dimensions of the proposed work. The plans must show the direction of North. A scale bar is encouraged.You had attached 2 copies of the Site/Block Plan with your last response, instead of Proposed Plans, therefore please re-submit the Proposed Plans, and check that they include a Proposed Roof Plan.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are not justified and will have an adverse effect on the tree and reduce its amenity value. Recommendation: Consent for lesser works.
